verses.verse: Now the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had sworn <S%H7650><s%> in Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "There shall not any <S%H376><s%> of us give <S%H5414><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> as wife. <S%H802><s%>"

The people <S%H5971><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H1004><s%> Bethel, <S%H430><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> there until evening <S%H6153><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their voices, <S%H6963><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> severely. <S%H1419><s%>

They said, <S%H559><s%> "Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> why has this happened in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that there should be today <S%H3117><s%> one <S%H259><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> lacking <S%H6485><s%> in Israel? <S%H3478><s%>"

It happened on the next day <S%H4283><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> rose early, <S%H7925><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> there an altar, <S%H4196><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> and peace offerings. <S%H5930><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Who is there among all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> didn't <S%H5927><s%> come up in the assembly <S%H6951><s%> to Yahweh? <S%H3068><s%>" For they had made a great <S%H1419><s%> oath <S%H7621><s%> concerning him who didn't <S%H5927><s%> come up to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "He shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>"

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> grieved <S%H5162><s%> for Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> their brother, <S%H251><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "There is one <S%H259><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> cut off <S%H1438><s%> from Israel <S%H3478><s%> this day. <S%H3117><s%>

How shall <S%H6213><s%> we provide wives <S%H802><s%> for those who remain, <S%H3498><s%> since we have sworn <S%H7650><s%> by Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> that we will not give <S%H5414><s%> them of our daughters <S%H1323><s%> to wives? <S%H802><s%>"

They said, <S%H559><s%> "What one <S%H259><s%> is there of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who didn't <S%H5927><s%> come up to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to Mizpah? <S%H4709><s%>" Behold, <S%H935><s%> there came none <S%H376><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> from Jabesh Gilead <S%H3003><s%> to the assembly. <S%H6951><s%>
For when the people <S%H5971><s%> were numbered, <S%H6485><s%> behold, <S%H376><s%> there were none of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jabesh Gilead there. <S%H3003><s%>

The congregation <S%H5712><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> there twelve <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the most valiant, <S%H1121><s%> and commanded <S%H6680><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> saying, "Go <S%H3212><s%> and strike <S%H5221><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jabesh Gilead <S%H3003><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> with the women <S%H802><s%> and the little ones. <S%H2945><s%>

This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> that you shall do: <S%H6213><s%> you shall utterly destroy <S%H2763><s%> every male, <S%H2145><s%> and every woman <S%H802><s%> who has lain <S%H4904><s%> with a man. <S%H3045><s%>"

They found <S%H4672><s%> among the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jabesh Gilead <S%H3003><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> young <S%H5291><s%> virgins, <S%H1330><s%> who had not known <S%H3045><s%> man <S%H376><s%> by lying <S%H4904><s%> with him; <S%H2145><s%> and they brought <S%H935><s%> them to the camp <S%H4264><s%> to Shiloh, <S%H7887><s%> which is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

The whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> who were in the rock <S%H5553><s%> of Rimmon, <S%H7417><s%> and proclaimed <S%H7121><s%> peace to them. <S%H7965><s%>

Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> at that time; <S%H6256><s%> and they gave <S%H5414><s%> them the women <S%H802><s%> whom they had saved alive <S%H2421><s%> of the women <S%H802><s%> of Jabesh Gilead: <S%H3003><s%> and yet so they weren't <S%H4672><s%> enough for them.

The people <S%H5971><s%> grieved <S%H5162><s%> for Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> because that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had made <S%H6213><s%> a breach <S%H6556><s%> in the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Then the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "How shall we provide <S%H6213><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> for those who remain, <S%H3498><s%> since the women <S%H802><s%> are destroyed <S%H8045><s%> out of Benjamin? <S%H1144><s%>"

They said, <S%H559><s%> "There must be an inheritance <S%H3425><s%> for those who are escaped <S%H6413><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> that a tribe <S%H7626><s%> not be blotted <S%H4229><s%> out from Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

However we may <S%H3201><s%> not give <S%H5414><s%> them wives <S%H802><s%> of our daughters, <S%H1323><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had sworn, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is he who gives <S%H5414><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> to Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>'"

They said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2282><s%> there is a feast of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> from year to year <S%H3117><s%> in Shiloh, <S%H7887><s%> which is on the north <S%H6828><s%> of Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> on the east side <S%H6828><s%> of the highway <S%H4546><s%> that goes up <S%H5927><s%> from Bethel <S%H1008><s%> to Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and on the south <S%H5045><s%> of Lebonah. <S%H3829><s%>"
They commanded <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Go <S%H3212><s%> and lie in wait <S%H693><s%> in the vineyards, <S%H3754><s%>

and see, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H1323><s%> if the daughters of Shiloh <S%H7887><s%> come out <S%H3318><s%> to dance <S%H2342><s%> in the dances, <S%H4246><s%> then come out <S%H3318><s%> of the vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> and each man <S%H376><s%> catch <S%H2414><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Shiloh, <S%H7887><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>

It shall be, <S%H1><s%> when their fathers or their brothers <S%H251><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to complain <S%H7378><s%> to us, <S%H559><s%> that we will say to them, <S%H2603><s%> 'Grant them graciously to us, <S%H3947><s%> because we didn't take for each man <S%H376><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> in battle, <S%H4421><s%> neither did you give <S%H5414><s%> them to them, <S%H6256><s%> otherwise you would now be guilty. <S%H816><s%>'"

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> did so, <S%H6213><s%> and took <S%H5375><s%> them wives, <S%H802><s%> according to their number, <S%H4557><s%> of those who danced, <S%H2342><s%> whom they carried <S%H1497><s%> off. <S%H3212><s%> They went and returned <S%H7725><s%> to their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> the cities, <S%H5892><s%> and lived in them. <S%H3427><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> departed <S%H1980><s%> there at that time, <S%H6256><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his tribe <S%H7626><s%> and to his family, <S%H4940><s%> and they went out <S%H3318><s%> from there every man <S%H376><s%> to his inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
In those days <S%H3117><s%> there was no king <S%H4428><s%> in Israel: <S%H3478><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> that which was right <S%H3477><s%> in his own eyes. <S%H5869><s%>
